THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON
11.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE
FOLLOWING:

2024/KER/1859
Crl.M.C.No.287/2024 ;
SOPHY THOMAS, J
 Cri.IM.C.Mo.287 of 2024
Dated this the 11" day of January, 2024
ORDER

This Crl.M.C. under Section 482 of CrPC is filed by the
sole accused in Crime No.354/2007 of Aranmula Police Station,
Pathanamthitta District, which is now pending before the
Judicial Magistrate of First Class-l, Pathanamthitta, as LP
No.83/2013, for a direction to the learned Magistrate, to
consider his bail application on the date of surrender itself.

2. Learned counsel for the petitioner would submit
that, the petitioner was abroad and so he could not appear
before the Court in time. The crime is of the year 2007 and his
case was transferred to LP register in the year 2013. Even
then, since his limited prayer is only to consider his bail
application on the date of surrender itself, this Crl.M.C. can be
allowed.

In the result, the Crl.M.C. is also allowed as follows:

The petitioner is at liberty to surrender before the Judicial
Magistrate of First Class-l, Pathanamthitta, in LP No.83/2013,

Bata
apes
2024/KER/1859
Crl.M.C.No.287/2024
on any day, before 30.01.2024. Learned Magistrate has to
consider his bail application on the date of surrender itself, as
far as possible, and pass appropriate orders. The arrest
warrant pending against him shall be kept in abeyance, till
30.01.2024.
Sd/-
SOPHY THOMAS
JUDGE
